name: LOGistICAL 2: Belgium
description: LOGistICAL 2: Belgium is a large open-world, strategy, puzzle game where you transport different cargoes to complete all the towns throughout the country. Over 550 towns and 11,000 mailboxes to complete including cities like Brussels, Antwerp, Ghent, Charleroi and many, many more.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256+MB with 1024x768 resolution Storage: 300 MB available space
